CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 3, 1953, pg. 7, reads: "Presbyterian Congress on Foreign Missions - Mrs. Rosa Page Welch, world renowned singer of church hymns and spirituals, was guest soloist here at the two-day Congress on Foreign Missions sponsored by the Women's Foreign Missionary Society of the Presbytery of Pittsburgh. Mrs. Welch is a native of Chicago.  Pictured are some of the top women who attended the conclave.  Left to right: Mrs. Henry D. Primas Sr., corresponding secretary of the sponsoring organization; Mrs. Harry D. Pedicord, president; Dr. John Hayes, guest speaker; Mrs. Rosa Page Welch, soloist, and Mrs. Gaius J. Slosser, president of the Allegheny County Council of Church Women. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of members of Presbyterian Congress on Foreign Missions from left: Mrs. Henry D. Primas Sr., Mrs. Harry D. Pedicord, Dr. John Hayes wearing clerical collar, Rosa Page Welch, and Gaius J. Slosser, posed in Presbytery of Pittsburgh, another version
